messages.title: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
messages.content: Nick Clegg's tax plan means the first £10,000 you earn tax-free, saving you over £700. Will you back a tax cut that works for you?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce a tax plan to make the first £10,000 earned tax-free, resulting in savings of more than £700.

issues.economy: Run many of our biggest companies... Council tax frozen again.

images.caption: Images showcasing John Appleby's engagement with the community and support across Tynemouth.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet displays support for John Appleby from Nick Clegg and showcases images that imply community engagement and campaigning on various issues.
